rules_text:
Proud Necrobutcher's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
Helvete {3}{G} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard by sacrificing a creature and paying its helvete cost reduced by that creature's power. It enters with a finality counter on it. If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)[/i]
